DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare effect intermittent continuous walk program walking endurance fatigue people multiple sclerosis ( MS ) .A randomize crossover prospective method used.The intervention consist eight 6-minute-long walk ( 2x/week 4 week ) . The continuous condition consist 6 continuous minute walk . The intermittent condition consist three 2-minute bout 2-minute rest . After 4-week detraining period , participant perform second training condition .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Intermittent v . Continuous Walking MS
DOC.criteria: Positive diagnosis MS Ambulatory least 6 minute without assistive device ( e.g . cane , crutch orthotics ) Ability read , understand , sign inform consent form Evidence exacerbation prior three month define treat physician Orthopedic cardiovascular condition would interfere ability walk 6 continuous minute , Currently active physical rehabilitation program
